column5: Soory to hear the terrible news,please accept our families condolences to your family,and try to think of all the happy times,take care,and once again sorry to hear the bad news,keep your head up
My condolences to you and your family,   Jorge
so sorry to hear

Very sorry to hear of your losses. It's always horrible to lose a loved one, but two and at this time of year is very tough. Coming together with your family will help all of you get through this. Take care.
wow tragic losses.  im very sorry to hear!  we are thinking of your family in this terrible time
my condolences and my  sympathies.
I'm so sorry to hear of your losses. My deepest condolances to you and your family/friends.
Having just lost my Mom last week I know how devastating this can be.  Condolences from Jo & I.
Kevin  My condolances for your loss bro, aweful news
I'm so sorry to hear of your losses Kevin. My deepest condolences.  Remo
Devastating news man... my prayers are with you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family.  lovetofish

Well, today was workin out to be a good day, not to much sleep after getting off work, but seemed to be a good day.  Well, then it turned out to be the worst day of my life in a matter of 3 phone calls....  I called my mom to say hi this eve, and my brother awnsered, I found it odd he would pick up the phone [:s]  I was then informed that my Mom's Best freind of 40+ yrs had past away [:^(]  I knew this woderfull woman from when I was born, She was an amazing lady in all ways!!! She had 2 great son's, and a beautiful daughter, and her husband "Gaston" was a man I still look up to. Beth succomed to Alzimers (Spelling?) and made her way to a better place, Bless her wonderfull soul.  So after about 2 hrs of tears (I'm home bymyself) I finally got to speak to my mother for some reason was out at my Uncle's place in Manotick. This I also found odd, for X-mas is around the corner and family would meet for sure then...  I tried mom's cell to no avail, so I called my uncle's home # and was greeted on the other end by a police officer........  Without detail, I spoke to my mother, and learned my beautiful cousin at only the age of 19 had her life taken away from her [:^(]  [:x]  Though I do not know anything of how it took place, I only 2 hrs before lost a woman I adored, but then to find out my beautiful cousin had also passed [:s]  Kelly was such a beautiful girl and had so many things going for her, she was off to college next yr(With Honours) and she was taken away from us way to soon. I as I write this still have tears on my face, I deserved to go, not her.  After loosing my Gramma just a few weeks back at the service, Kelly read a poem for Gramma, and now the family enduring this loss (Esp my lovley mom's for loosing her best friend) I hate to say it, but X-mas just aint going to be a celebration.  To Beth Hone  And  Kelly Pegg  You will always be in your families and friends heart and thoughts  I love you both and, will miss you more than I could say.  Float.
really sorry to hear this...... my condolences  kevin
Sorry for your losses Float... anytime is bad, but around Christmas is always the worst. Hang tough for the family fella.
Stay strong, Kev..God bless.

Double bad news, very sorry to hear.  Hold it together the best you can to offer as much support as you can muster. Pretty tough losing anyone at this time of year.  Have faith and all the best to you and the family close to the loved ones.
Tragic news to hear Float.  My condolences to you and the Families concerned.
My condolences.  Stay strong and treasure the memories.
I'm very sorry for your loss of family and good friend. Very tragic.
Sorry for your loss my condolences to you and your family  Rob
That's very sad to hear Float, Leslie's and my prayers are with you and your family tonight.
How very sad.......best condolences go out to you and your family as you deal with these tragic losses.  Hawk

That's the worst news I have heard in a long time. Losing close family is the hardest thing to do deal with in life, but it can bring families closer together. My condolences go to you and your family, and i hope that the rest of your X-mas goes smoothly.  -Ramble
My condolences,  Maureen
Geeze Float - that does make for one heck of a bad day.  Truely very sorry to hear about the loss in your family, but two in the same day.  My condolences to you and your family.

MAN BRO ANY LOSS IS TUFF BUT 2 ON THE SAME DAY!!! SO SORRY TO HERE BRO AND I MY HEART GOES OUT TO YA!!! IF YA EVER NEED TO GET YOUR MIND OFF THINGS FOR THE DAY WE CAN ALWAYS SHARE A DRIFT!! FIRST CHUCNK IF STEEL I CATCH IS IN MEMORY FOR BETH AND KELLY FOR YOU BRO!! HOPE ROX AND THE GIRLS ARE DOIN OK AS WELL!!! ALL MY LOVE SCOTT
Very sorry to hear Kev, my thoughts are with you.
You have my sympathies brother... try and be strong, your Mother is going to need you more now then ever before.  Gerritt.
My condolences to you and your family...
Not good news at all. Please accept my sympathies to all who were close.
Not good news at all. Please accept my sympathies to all who were close.
Sincerest sympathies on you loss. I know first hand how tough this is.  John...
My condolences to your family.  Thats pretty rough.
Wow...very sorry to hear of your losses float.  Condolences to you and to all who knew these great people.
Kevin. So Sorry. Peace to you and your Family. Ken And Nancy
My deepest condolences to you and your family.  Relish in your memories.  John
